attributes.action: force the disbantion of Planetarion alliance Ascendancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ascendancy have dominated too long.  They, like the taliban of Afghanistan, are a drain on the game and are slowly killing the game and the community itself.  Surely this is something when it damages the recreation time of citizens all across the globe.  Action is needed!

Please, mr. Prime Minister, shut down this abomination of an alliance so our game can have a fun round for once!!

rejection.details: It is unclear what you are requesting the government do. Please rephrase your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
